If that double-disc was defined by its unwieldy sprawl, its songs spewed not sequenced, IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢m with You is characterized by its focus, both within individual tunes and the songs as a whole. New guitarist Josh Klinghoffer -- veteran sideman and longtime pal of Frusciante who provided secondary guitar on the closing stretch of the Stadium Arcadium tour -- doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t compete for center stage the way previous Peppers did. He doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t strut, he weaves, disappearing so completely into the arrangements he doesnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t seem to leave his signature despite the heavy layers of guitars on each cut. This makes IÃ¢â‚¬â„¢m with You the flipside of One Hot Minute, where the Chili Peppers bent over backward to accommodate Dave Navarro: the Peppers donÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t miss a step, they almost seem relieved to be carrying on without Frusciante.
